attributes.action: stop the ban on messaging apps
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the people who use social media apps such as WhatsApp and Snapchat because Mr Cameron thinks that banning these app's will stop terrorist's from commnicating with each other.

We all know that won't work because putting a ban on all social media messaging app's will not stop terrorism except it will cause many problems for people who enjoy app's such as WhatsApp, Snapchat, instagram and alot more.

We don't live in a dictatorship, Mr Cameron will probably ban the Internet too, We'd all be aswell switching back to the old Nokia mobile's because what's the point of having a smartphone without the use of Applications.

I'm making this petition for others to enjoy themselves by using application's for their mobile's.

rejection.details: This isn't very clear, sorry.   Can you re-submit?   It looks as though it should be for the Home Office if it is about the Government legislating about communications to counteract terrorism and security issues.
